headline: SPAR Group Announces Relocation of Corporate Headquarters
summary: AUBURN HILLS, Mich., July 29, 2025--SPAR Group is proud to announce the relocation of its corporate headquarters to Charlotte, North Carolina.

raw.headline: SPAR Group Announces Relocation of Corporate Headquarters
raw.summary: AUBURN HILLS, Mich., July 29, 2025--SPAR Group is proud to announce the relocation of its corporate headquarters to Charlotte, North Carolina.

headline: Frontline Response Receives $750,000 in Support from Lowe's and Spry Global Toward $1.2 Million Expansion to Aid DeKalb County's Unhoused
summary: In a powerful demonstration of commitment to combat homelessness, Lowe's Home Improvement and Spry Global have contributed $750,000 in materials and labor toward a $1.2 million expansion of Frontline Response's facility at 2585 Gresham Road in DeKalb County. The expansion will significantly enhance the organization's ability to serve unhoused individuals and families with dignity, care, and accessibility. headline: Lowe's Stock: Dividend Doesn't Lie

headline: Jim Cramer on Lowe’s CEO: “He’s Doing His Best”
summary: Lowe’s Companies, Inc. (NYSE:LOW) is one of the stocks that Jim Cramer weighed in on.
